title: This phone makes my hands look BIG! - ASUS Zenfone 8
description: Grab your new iFixit Fix Kit at   The ASUS Zenfone line has been out for a while, but recently it's getting incrementally better and better. The ASUS Zenfone 8 is a bit interesting as it's priced well, has some of the top features/specs, but it doesn't follow other brands in making it compact. Also, it makes Linus hands feel big for a change.   Check out the ASUS Zenfone 8 at  Check out the ASUS Zenfone 8 Flip at   Buy ASUS Zenfone On Amazon (Paid Link):  On NewEgg (Paid Link):   Purchases made through some store links may provide some compensation to Linus Media Group.  Timestamps:  0:00 - ASUS spells phone fone 0:11 - Linus plays with stickers 0:19 - Unboxing really starts 0:33 - Showing off the Zenfone 8 2:27 - Rest of the unboxing 2:36 - iFixit! 3:01 - Included Charger 3:05 - More in-depth look at the phone 3:39 - Zenfone 8 Display Information 4:45 - Zenfone 8 Performance Specs 5:40 - Watching videos on the Zenfone 8 5:55 - Quick speaker-test 6:13 - Zenfone 8 Camera Test 6:43 - Zenfone 8 Flip differences 7:17 - Final thoughts  GET MERCH:  SUPPORT US ON FLOATPLANE:    LTX EXPO:      AFFILIATES & REFERRALS --------------------------------------------------- Affiliates, Sponsors & Referrals:  Private Internet Access VPN:  Our Official Charging Partner Anker:  MK Keyboards:  Nerd or Die Stream Overlays:  Official Game Store:  Amazon Prime:  Audible Free Trial:  Our Gear on Amazon:    FOLLOW US ELSEWHERE ---------------------------------------------------   Twitter:  Instagram:  Facebook:     FOLLOW OUR OTHER CHANNELS ---------------------------------------------------   Linus Tech Tips:  TechLinked:  Mac Address:  Techquickie:    LMG Clips:  Channel Super Fun:  Carpool Critics:
